item.title: Report X-2024021583
item.description:
Report X-2024021583

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-06T18:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-14
  • City: SHREWSBURY
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: HAZMAT PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE DMP BECAUSE IT NEEDED TO BE AUDITED. AN ODOR WAS COMING FROM THE BOX. ONE OF THE INNER CONTAINERS WAS LEAKING. PACKAGE WAS PROCESSED USING THE DECISION TREE FOR OXIDIZERS.

item.title: Report X-2024021582
item.description:
Report X-2024021582

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-06T18:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-14
  • City: SHREWSBURY
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: DAMAGED HAZMAT WAS FOUND OUTSIDE THE TRAILER IN THE UNLOAD. PACKAGE WAS REMOVED FROM THE TRAILER AND WAS LEAKING OUT THROUGH THE GRATES ONTO THE CONCRETE BELOW. PACKAGE WAS CONTAINED USING THE DECISION TREE FOR FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS AND BROUGHT TO THE DMP. PACKAGE WAS THEN PROCESSED USING THE DECISION TREE FOR FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS.

item.title: Report X-2024021574
item.description:
Report X-2024021574

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-04T15:11:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-20
  • City: CHELMSFORD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT NEEDED TO BE REWRAPPED. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED ONE GEN ROCK K300 PORTABLE POWER STATION WITH AN INTERNAL 222 WH LITHIUM ION BATTERY. THREE INIU POWER BANKS ARE ALSO INSIDE THE PACKAGE. TWO POWER BANKS ARE 74 WH AND ONE POWER BANK IS 37 WH. THERE IS AN INNER BOX WITH A UN3480 LITHIUM-ION BATTERY MARKING APPLIED. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report E-2024020588
item.description:
Report E-2024020588

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-04T15:11:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-29
  • City: CHICOPEE
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO Logistics
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: It was reported that approximately half a gallon of resin solution (Hazardous - UN1866) released due to a pallet nail puncture. The released product was contained to the concrete dock floor. The released product, damaged drum, and Oil-Dri were placed into a 65-gallon metal drum and staged in OS&D. There were no drains, soils or waterways reported to have been impacted by the release.
